seed:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., sown, to raise crops for food, usu. corn (wheat, barely, etc.) Ge 47:19, Ge 47:23 (J; cf. v:Ge 47:14 f.), Nu 24:7 (JE); [[נׇתַן]] [[לַזּׁרֵעַ]] ´[[ז]] Is 55:10 (‖[[לֶחֶם]]), De 28:38 ([[רַב]] ´[[ז]]), Le 26:16 (H; c. definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: infr.; ´[[זְנִנַּשׁ תוֹרֵשׁ בַּקּוֹחֵר וְדׂרֵךְ עֲנׇבִים בְּמשֵׁךְ הַזּ]] Am 9:13, in fig. of rapid and plentiful growth in the coming time; [[הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[ז]] producing a vine Ez Eze 17:5, of growth and prosperity of Isr.; ´[[הַזּ]] Mal 2:3, rd. perh. [[הַזְּרׂעַ]] (cf. VB).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: seed as product; the manna is comp. with [[גַּד]] ´[[ז]], coriander seed Nu 11:7 (JE), Ex 16:31 (P); seed of herbs and trees Ge 1:11, Ge 1:11, Ge 1:12, Ge 1:12, Ge 1:29, Ge 1:29 (all P). Esp.

definitions.body: seed as corn-product, corn-crop, so (although not quite clearly) De 22:9 (c. [[זׇרַע]]; ‖[[תְּבוּאַת הַכָָּרֶם]]); pl. 1Sa 8:15 (perh. better arable lands, cf. supr. As zêru; ‖[[כרמים]]), [[הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[ז]] Le 27:30 (‖[[פְּרִי־עֵץ]]; otherwise Ge 47:24, cf. supr.

definitions.body: [[זֶרַע הַשָּׁלוֹם הַגֶּפֶן]] Zec 8:12, rd. perh. [[זַרַע]] Ge 1:11, Le 26:16, Je 35:7 +; [[הִפְרִיחַ]] Is 17:11; [[נׇתַן בְּ]] = plant, sow Ez Eze 17:5; [[נׇתַן]] yield Is 55:10; [[מָשַׁךְ]] Am 9:13.

seed = off spring:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: rarely of animals, coll. Ge 3:15, Ge 7:3 (both J). Usu.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of mankind, coll. = descendants, posterity; seed of the woman Ge 3:15 (J); seed of the patriarchs (esp. Abr.) Ge 12:17, Ge 13:15, Ge 13:16, Ge 13:16, Ge 16:10, Ge 22:17, Ge 22:17, Ge 22:18, Ge 24:7, Ge 26:3, Ge 26:4, Ge 26:4, Ge 26:4, Ge 26:24, Ge 28:13, Ge 28:14, Ge 28:14, Ge 32:13 (all J), Ge 15:13, Ge 15:18, Ex 32:13, Ex 32:13, Ex 33:1 (all JE), Ge 21:12, Jos 24:3 (both E; in both promised seed of Abr. restricted to line of Isaac), De 11:9, De 34:4, Ne 9:8; = a son as involving posterity Ge 15:3, Ge 15:5 (JE) cf. infr.; phr. [[זַרְעָם אַחֲרֵיהֶם]] De 1:8, cf. De 4:37, De 10:15, so P, Ge 17:7, Ge 17:7, Ge 17:8, Ge 17:9, Ge 17:10, Ge 17:19, Ge 35:12, Ge 48:4; [[זִרְעֲךָ אִתָּךְ]] Ge 28:4 (P; cf. Nu 18:19); v. also infr.

definitions.title: c. c.
definitions.body: seed (= posterity) of other individuals Ge 21:13 (E; of Ishmael) Ge 24:60, Ge 48:19 (both J), Nu 14:24 (JE), Le 21:21, Le 22:3, Le 22:4 (all H), Nu 17:5 (P), 1Sa 20:42, 1Sa 20:42, 1Sa 24:22, 2Sa 4:8, 1Ki 2:33, 1Ki 2:33, 1Ki 11:39, 2Ki 5:27, Je 29:32, Ez Eze 43:19, Job 5:25 (‖[[חֶאֱחָאֶיךָ]]), Job 21:8 (‖ id.); esp. of seed of David as anointed to reign Ps 18:51 = 2Sa 22:51 (‖[[לִמְשִׁיחוֹ]]), as sitting on throne Je 33:21, cf. v:Je 33:22, v:Je 33:26, Ps 89:5, Ps 89:30, Ps 89:37; of Jehoiachin Je 22:28, Je 22:30, Jehoiakim Je 36:31 (cf. v:Je 36:30); of child (son) as involving posterity Ge 38:8, Ge 38:9, Ge 38:9 (of Er's seed by Onam); Ge 48:11 (all J), cf. Ge 19:32, Ge 19:31 (J), 2Sa 7:12, Ru 4:12, Le 21:15 (H); phr. [[זַרְעָם אַחֲרֵיהֶם]] of seed of Noah and his sons Ge 9:9; of Aaron Ex 28:43; of Phinehas Nu 25:13 (all P); of David 1Ch 17:11; [[לְזַרְעוֹ לְדׂרׂתָם]] Ex 30:21 (P), cf. Le 21:17 (H; both of Aaron), v. also

definitions.title: b
definitions.body: supr. ´[[ז]], of seed of righteous, esp. Psalm Psalm:—Ps 25:13, Ps 37:25, Ps 37:26, Ps 69:37, Ps 102:28 (‖[[בָּנִים]]), Ps 112:2 (‖[[דּוֹר ישׁרים]]), cf. Ps 22:31 (on txt. v. Che); of wicked Ps 21:11, Ps 37:28.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: specif. of a particular child (son) [[אַחֵר]] ´[[ז]] Ge 4:25 (J); [[אֲנׇשִׁים]] ´[[ז]] 1Sa 1:11; of children Le 18:21, Le 20:2, Le 20:34, Le 22:13 (all H), 1Sa 2:20 (cf. [[בָּנִים]], [[בָּנוֹת]] v:1Sa 2:21); children and grandchildren Ge 46:6, Ge 46:7 (P).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: family Ge 17:12 (P; cf. As. zêr bit abišu Asrb:Annals iii. 10); note esp. of royal family [[הַמֶּלֶךְ]] ´[[ז]] 1Ki 11:14; [[הַמַּמְלָכָה]] ´[[ז]] 2Ki 11:1 = 2Ch 22:10; [[הַמְּלוּכָה]] ´[[ז]] 2Ki 25:25 = Je 41:1, Ez Eze 17:13, Da 1:3; = pedigree [[בית אבותם וְזַרְעָם]] Ezr 2:59 = Ne 7:61; = one's nation, as of same blood Es 10:3 (‖[[עַם]]).—Some vbs. used c. ´[[ז]] in these senses are:—[[נׇתַן]], God subj. Ge 15:3, Ru 4:12 (sq. [[מִן]] of woman); [[שִׂים]] 1Sa 2:20; c. man as subj. [[נתן]] Ge 38:9; [[הֵקִים]] v:Ge 38:8; ´[[חִיׇּה ז]], keep alive, or give life to, of animals Ge 7:3; of woman Ge 19:32, Ge 19:34 (sq. [[מִן]] of man).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: esp. as name for people of Isr., seed of Abr. Is 41:8, 2Ch 20:7 (‖[[עַמְּךָ יִשְׂרָאֵל]]), Je 33:26, Ps 105:6 (‖[[בְּנֵי יעקִב]]); of Isr. or Jacob 2Ki 17:20, Ne 9:2 (‖[[בני ישׂראל]] v:Ne 9:1), Is 43:5, Is 45:19, Is 45:25, Je 31:36, Je 31:37, Je 33:26, Ps 22:24, Ps 22:24, 1Ch 16:13 (‖[[בני יעקב]]); so [[בֵּית ישׂראל]] ´[[ז]] Je 23:8, Ez Eze 44:22 (SyrVer LXX codd. Co del. [[בית]]); [[בית]] ´[[ז]] [[יעקב]] Ez Eze 20:5; in Est. [[הַיְהוּדִים]] ´[[ז]] Es 6:13; so of Edom (seed of Esau) Je 49:10, cf. [[מִוֶּרע מָדַי]] Da 9:1.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: seed of Isr. (or Jacob, or the people), is used also, by (later) prophets, of future generations, in addressing the people:—De 28:46, De 28:59, De 30:6, De 30:19, De 31:21, cf. Nu 18:19 (P; [[לְזַרְעֲךָ אִתָָּךְ]], ‖[[וּלְבָנֶיךָ וְלִבְנוֹתֶיךָ]]), Je 30:10 = Je 46:27 (Jacob and Isr. here = people), Ps 106:27; ‖([[יך ]])[[חֶאֱחָא]] Is 44:3 (Jacob and Jeshurun), Is 48:19, cf. Is 61:9; also Je 7:15, Is 54:3, Is 66:22 (‖[[שִׁמְכֶם]]); [[מִפִּי זַרְעֲךָ וּמִפִּי זֶרַע זַרְעֲךָ]] Is 59:21; of Jews ([[יהודים]]) Es 9:27, Es 9:28, Es 9:31.
